Global

Methods

search(keyword, language) → {Array.<WikiArticle>}

Searches Wikipedia
Parameters:
Name Type Description
keyword string The search query
language string The wikipedia language code
Source:
  • index.js, line 32
Returns:
- The article list
Type
Array.<WikiArticle>
Example
const wikipedia = require("@dada513/wikipedia-search");

async function app() {
  const res = await wikipedia.search("Hello, world", "en");
  console.log(res);
}

app();

Type Definitions

WikiArticle

A wikipedia article
Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Description
url string The URL of the article
textSnippet string A summary of the article, in plain text
htmlSnippet string A description of the article, in HTML
timestamp string Article last updated
pageid number The ID of the page
wordcount number The number of words in the article
size number The size of the article
